    Production & Research

    Not only is Qualitech™ relevant in industrial works, but also in production and research. Qualitech™ can help you ensure that your production lines remain properly running and your products consistenly of best quality.

Clients

Paint & Coatings

Ink & Chemical

Adhesives

Research Labs

Instruments Used

  • Appearance

    Measure the glossiness, colour assessment of paints, inks

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Dispersion Density & Viscosity

    Viscometers, flow cups, grind gauges for paints, chemicals, inks, adhesives, etc.

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Elasticity & Deformation

    Impact tester, mandrel bend tester for testing paint, etc.

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Hardness & Abrasion

    Pencil hardness tester, Duro Meter, Barcol Impressor, Taber Abraser for paints

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Drying & Washability

    Linear Drying Time Recorder, Washability & Abrasion Tester, for paints and coatings

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Dry Film Thickness

    Measurement of dry film thickness of paints and coatings

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Adhesion Testing

    Testing of bond strength for adhesives, putty, paints and coatings

    Go to Elcometer™ page
